channel.title: Documentation for DP3 project on CVM Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation for DP3 project on CVM Documentation

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D4_DU_matched_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT_to_MS-COHORTcontains D3_DU_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT plus persons from D3_DU_MS-COHORT, the latter matched 4-1 to the former, and being non-pregnant during the pregnancy period of the matched pregnancy D5_DU_matching_diagnosticNA

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D3_persons D3_output_spells_category conceptsetdataset itemsetdataset promptsetdataset D3_clean_spells D3_selection_criteria_from_PERSONS_to_study_population

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D4_study_population_SAP1 Flowchart_exclusion_criteriacounts of how many indivuals from PERSONS are excluded in the study population

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D3_study_population_SAP1contains the baseline characteristics of the study population D3_main_components D5_meaning_occurencescounts for MS and SLE of each original_meaning D3_components_MS_SAP1contains the components of MS and their combinations. Components and combination are expressed as dates to allow for computation of prevalence. This D3 is based on Table 1 of the SAP1 D3_components_multiple_lookback_MS D3_algorithms_MScontains the dates when each person in the study population becomes positive for MS according to any of the 5 algorithms

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D5_N_women_and_ranges_MSvalues needed for Template 1 of the SAP: for each component, N of women, median time in study population and IQR (Years), and median and IQR age at study entry date

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D5_N_women_and_ranges_MS_maskedvalues needed for Template 1 of the SAP: for each component, N of women, median time in study population and IQR (Years), and median and IQR age at study entry date Flowchart_exclusion_criteria_maskedcounts of how many indivuals from PERSONS are excluded in the study population D5_meaning_occurences_maskedcounts for MS and SLE of each original_meaning

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D3_SAP1_MS-COHORT D3_DU_selection_criteria_from_SAP1_MS_cohort_to_DU_MS_cohortcontains the exclusion criteria to go from D3_study_population_SAP1_MS to the study population of the DP3 SAP2 D5_DU_flowchart_exclusion_criteria_from_SAP1_MS_cohort_to_DU_MS_cohort D3_DU_selection_criteria_from_pregnancies_to_PREGNANCY-COHORT_and_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT D5_DU_flowchart_exclusion_criteria_from_pregnancies_to_PREGNANCY-COHORT_and_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT D3_DU_PREGNANCY-COHORTcontains the cohort of pregnancies included in the study D3_DU_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT

item.title: _index.en
item.description: D5_DU_flowchart_exclusion_criteria_from_pregnancies_to_PREGNANCY-COHORT_and_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT D3_DU_PREGNANCY-COHORTcontains the cohort of pregnancies included in the study D3_DU_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT D4_DU_prevalence_MS_in_pregnancy_cohortcontains the aggregated prevalence (numerators and denominators) needed to compute prevalence of MS in the pregnancy cohort, to feed Template 4 and 5 D4_DU_matched_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT_to_MS-COHORTcontains D3_DU_MS-PREGNANCY-COHORT plus persons from D3_DU_MS-COHORT, the latter matched 4-1 to the former, and being non-pregnant during the pregnancy period of the matched pregnancy D3_DU_matching_diagnostic
